name: Python 3 (Streamlit Plan vs Real)
postCreateCommand: python3 -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install --upgrade pip && if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then pip install -r requirements.txt; fi
postAttachCommand: . .venv/bin/activate && streamlit run app.py --server.port 8501 --server.headless true --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false
